details.description: Contact information for VOSA for information and advice on testing schemes and local testing stations
details.alternative_title: Contact information for Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA)
details.body:
Get advice about VOSA testing and enforcement schemes and access manuals and guides.

VOSA www.dft.gov.uk/vosa enquiries@vosa.gov.uk
Telephone: 0300 123 9000
Monday to Friday, 7:30am to 6pm

VOSA
Berkeley House
Croydon Street
Bristol
BS5 0DA

You can also contact your local VOSA test station.

details.description: Includes getting an MOT, MOT fees and vehicle insurance

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

related.title: Apply for a Vehicle Identity Check (VIC) online

details.description: Use the VIC1 form to apply for a Vehicle Identity Check appointment
Report a vehicle with a serious safety defect to the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA)

related.title: Check the MOT history of a vehicle

details.description: Check the MOT history of a vehicle - get a full MOT test history and mileage of the vehicle at the time of each test

related.title: Book a single annual test online

details.description: This service allows you to book, reschedule or cancel an annual test or paid retest for a single vehicle only

related.title: Book tests for multiple vehicles online

details.description: Book, reschedule or cancel multiple annual tests, paid retests, prohibition clearances, Reduced Pollution Certificate (RPC) and Low Emissions Certificate (LEC) tests, and voluntary tests

related.title: Find your nearest VOSA test station for commercial vehicles

details.description: Find VOSA test stations for commercial vehicles in England, Scotland and Wales - address, contact details, types of test
